function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Speculative view rather than discussing possibilities in relation to current practice","Impact":"Potential for unrealistic or impractical design solutions","Mitigation":"Incorporate current best practices and real-world constraints into design process","Technologies":"Design simulation software, real-time data analysis tools","People":"Architects, building design professionals","Owner":"Architects, design firms, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Calls for new ethically-based, collaborative and deliberative principles and practices","Impact":"Resistance or pushback from clients or stakeholders","Mitigation":"Education and advocacy for the benefits of ethical and collaborative design","Technologies":"Collaboration and communication platforms, ethical decision-making frameworks","People":"Architects, building design professionals, clients, stakeholders","Owner":"Architects, design firms, industry organizations"},{"Description":"Selective use of existing research sources","Impact":"Biased or incomplete understanding of relevant issues","Mitigation":"Peer review, inclusion of diverse perspectives, and critical analysis of sources","Technologies":"Research database tools, plagiarism detection software","People":"Authors, researchers, reviewers","Owner":"Research institutions, academic journals"}]}
